missedCalls.title: Missed calls cost you revenue

availability.title: 24/7 availability across Estonia
availability.description: A large portion of booking and appointment inquiries happen outside business hours. Our AI answers calls around the clock across Estonia.

results.title: Proven Results
results.description: Our clients in Tallinn and other Estonian cities experience significant results within the first few months.

integration.title: Seamless Integration

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: EFFI values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our AI-powered phone systems and services.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect the following types of information:

items.contact: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)
items.usage: Service usage data (call recordings, conversation logs)
items.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataUse.title: Data Usage
dataUse.content: We use your data for the following purposes:

items.communication: Communicating with you and providing support

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except as required by law or with your explicit consent. We may use trusted service providers who help us deliver services, but they are obligated to handle your data confidentially.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All data is encrypted and stored on secure servers.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Under GDPR, you have the right to:

items.portability: Receive your data in a readable format

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve user experience and for analytics purposes. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect website functionality.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us:

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via email or through our website. We recommend regularly reviewing this policy to stay informed of any changes.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using EFFI AI services, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: Services
services.content: EFFI provides AI-powered phone and customer service solutions. Our services include automated call handling, booking management, and responding to customer inquiries.

usage.title: Usage Terms
usage.content: When using our services, you agree to:

items.lawful: Use services only for lawful purposes
items.authorized: Not use services in unauthorized ways

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Services are provided according to agreed pricing. Payments are due on scheduled dates. We may suspend service for unpaid invoices.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: EFFI is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages that may arise from using our services. Our liability is limited to the agreed service cost.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the agreement according to agreed terms. Upon termination, all data will be removed in accordance with our privacy policy.

changes.title: Terms Changes
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. We will notify you of changes in advance. By continuing to use services after changes, you agree to the new terms.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms, please contact us:
